Logo

Primary Dark Background

Emotion

Negative Space #FFFFFF

A clean, open, minimalistic bran will promote the undistracting nature of the in-app experience of WriteOn.

Emotion: Balance, Neutral, Calm.

Examples: Medium, Maptia.

Grayscale Contrast #545454

With use of mostly grayscale color contrasts, the simplistic nature of negative space will be emphasized even more.

Emotion: Gumbo beet greens corn soko endive gumbo gourd. Parsley shallot courgette tatsoi pea sprouts fava bean collard greens dandelion okra wakame tomato.

Examples: Medium.

Flat Accent Colors #BBDDEE & #EEAA99

Flat accent colors, derived from the colors found on notebook paper, will make for a non-distracting addition to this minimalistic color palette.

Emotion: Balance, Neutral, Calm.

Examples: MailChimp, Simple.

Color Palette

  • Secondary Colors

  • #545454

  • #cccccc

  • #92c9e4

  • #eeaa99
